features.featureDescription: Easily scan to connect select appliances, and connect to WiFi for real-time notifications, access to guides and manuals, personalized settings or control of your appliance from anywhere. Tap and swipe on both iOS and Android devices.
Use voice commands with a compatible Alexa-enabled device or the Google Assistant to get updates or control select appliances. Set Nest Learning Thermostats® to react to rising oven temperatures.
You'll indulge in culinary adventures tailored precisely to your preferences with step-by-step Assisted Cooking, My Creations, timers and more for select appliances.

Connect with the JennAir Epicenter with a call to tap into the brilliant minds of experts who know JennAir® appliances inside and out. Receive diagnostic codes on the app and they’ll deploy service targeted to your appliance’s best interest. Quick access to schedule service link
